page.title: 17Home Life in our D-block
page.content: The average family consists of a mother, father and two or three children. Most fathers work but many cannot find suitable work due to the high rate of unemployment in the area. Some mothers also work but others stay at home to look after small children. Children aged between five and sixteen must go to day school. In the evening and at weekends the family take part in the many recreational activities suppled by the town. Most families have a pet. The most popular pet is a dog but other families prefer to keep smaller animals.
